introduction: Do you have a balanced news diet? Go to https://ground.news/KiN to see reporting from a variety of s

vocabulary.definition: lower in rank, status, or quality
vocabulary.example: Despite being less expensive, the quality of the product was inferior to its competitors.

vocabulary.definition: confined to a specific area or region
vocabulary.example: The pain relief cream works by targeting the affected area, providing localized relief.

vocabulary.definition: perceptible by touch; clear and definite; real
vocabulary.example: The artist wanted to create tangible results from his abstract ideas.
The damage done to the ancient artifact was irreparable, despite all restoration efforts.

vocabulary.definition: made in imitation of something else with intent to deceive
vocabulary.example: The market was flooded with counterfeit designer handbags that closely resembled the originals.

vocabulary.definition: required or expected to justify actions or decisions; responsible
vocabulary.example: As a team leader, you are accountable for the project's success or failure.
